full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 170 of 228 846 LC2Qmax5 - corrected Alessi - Direct 1 A. Yes, I did. 2 Q. About how many times? 3 A. Two, three times. 4 Q. And on those times, did you then drive Virginia somewhere? 5 A. I drove from her house in Royal Palm Beach to the house in Palm Beach. 6 7 Q. How about on the times she had luggage, do you know where she went from there with her luggage? 8 9 A. They went with Mr. Epstein and Ms. Maxwell to the plane. 10 Q. How do you know that? 11 A. Because I brought them. I was the driver. 12 Q. Did you drive right onto the tarmac? 13 A. Up to the tarmac. 14 Q. Who did you see get on the plane? 15 A. Mr. Epstein, Ms. Maxwell, the chefs, Ms. Tayler, little Max, they went on the plane. 16 17 Q. Did you also see Virginia go on the plane? 18 A. Yes. 19 Q. Do you remember approximately when you first met Virginia? 20 A. Not exactly, but I would say it's 2001. 21 Q. We can take these exhibits down. Thank you, Ms. Drescher. 22 Mr. Alessi, about how often did Mr. Epstein receive 23 massages at the Palm Beach residence while you worked for him? 24 A. In the beginning, he receive around one. At the end of my stay, he received up to three massages per day. 25 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018043
